columns.name: race_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each race.

columns.name: season_year
columns.description: Year of the racing season.

columns.name: round
columns.description: Round number of the race within the season.

columns.name: race_name
columns.description: Name of the race.

columns.name: race_date
columns.description: Date when the race took place.

columns.name: circuit_name
columns.description: Name of the circuit where the race was held.

columns.name: circuit_location
columns.description: Location of the circuit.

columns.name: circuit_country
columns.description: Country where the circuit is located.

columns.name: driver_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each driver.

columns.name: driver_code
columns.description: Code representing the driver.

columns.name: driver_number
columns.description: Number assigned to the driver.

columns.name: driver_name
columns.description: Full name of the driver.

columns.name: driver_dob
columns.description: Date of birth of the driver.

columns.name: driver_nationality
columns.description: Nationality of the driver.

columns.name: constructor_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each constructor.

columns.name: constructor_name
columns.description: Name of the constructor.

columns.name: constructor_nationality
columns.description: Nationality of the constructor.

columns.name: grid_position
columns.description: Starting position of the driver on the grid.

columns.name: race_position
columns.description: Final position of the driver in the race.

columns.name: points
columns.description: Points earned by the driver in the race.

columns.name: laps_completed
columns.description: Number of laps completed by the driver.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the driver at the end of the race (e.g., Finished, Retired).

columns.name: fastest_lap
columns.description: Fastest lap number completed by the driver.

columns.name: fastest_lap_time
columns.description: Time taken for the fastest lap.

columns.name: pit_stop_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each pit stop.

columns.name: race_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the race associated with the pit stop.

columns.name: driver_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the driver associated with the pit stop.

columns.name: stop
columns.description: The stop number during the race.

columns.name: lap
columns.description: Lap number during which the pit stop occurred.

columns.name: time
columns.description: Time at which the pit stop occurred.

columns.name: duration
columns.description: Duration of the pit stop.

columns.name: qualifying_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each qualifying result.

columns.name: race_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the race associated with the qualifying result.

columns.name: driver_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the driver associated with the qualifying result.

columns.name: constructor_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the constructor associated with the qualifying result.

columns.name: position
columns.description: Position achieved by the driver in the qualifying session.

columns.name: q1_time
columns.description: Time achieved by the driver in Q1.

columns.name: q2_time
columns.description: Time achieved by the driver in Q2.

columns.name: q3_time
columns.description: Time achieved by the driver in Q3.

columns.name: standing_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each driver standing.

columns.name: race_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the race associated with the driver standing.

columns.name: driver_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the driver.

columns.name: points
columns.description: Points earned by the driver in the race.

columns.name: position
columns.description: Position of the driver in the standings.

columns.name: wins
columns.description: Number of wins by the driver.

columns.name: standing_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each constructor standing.

columns.name: race_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the race associated with the constructor standing.

columns.name: constructor_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the constructor.

columns.name: points
columns.description: Points earned by the constructor in the race.

columns.name: position
columns.description: Position of the constructor in the standings.

columns.name: wins
columns.description: Number of wins by the constructor.
